trans-unit.source: Provides the base class for types that represent a panel item on a smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a classe base para tipos que representam um item do painel no painel de marcações inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem> class serves as an abstract base for classes that represent individual panel items in a smart tag panel, which represents a menu-like user interface (UI) for smart tags.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem> classe serve como um resumo base para classes que representam os itens do painel individual no painel de marcas inteligentes, que representa uma interface de menu como usuário (UI) de marcas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] supplies derived classes that represent the different common entries in a smart tag panel, including plain text, header text, properties and methods of the associated <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> class, and designer verbs.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] fornece as classes derivadas que representam as entradas comuns diferentes no painel de marcas inteligentes, incluindo texto sem formatação, o texto do cabeçalho, propriedades e métodos de associado <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> classe e verbos do designer.

trans-unit.source: Typically, your `DesignerAction` feature is defined in a programmer-supplied class derived from <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>, which contains a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A> method that groups individual panel items together to form the smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, o `DesignerAction` recurso é definido em uma classe fornecida pelo programador derivada <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>, que contém um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A> método que agrupa os itens do painel individuais para formar o painel de marcas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionPropertyItem> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> types are associated with members of the class derived from <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> objects are activated when their associated panel entry is selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionPropertyItem> e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> tipos estão associados aos membros da classe derivada de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>, e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> objetos são ativados quando sua entrada no painel associada é selecionada pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: Forms and dialog boxes can be displayed by members of the class derived from <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>.
trans-unit.target: Formulários e caixas de diálogo podem ser exibidas por membros da classe derivada de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>.

trans-unit.source: By default, the parent of these windows will be the container window for the smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o pai dessas janelas será a janela de contêiner para o painel de marcas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: Explicitly parenting these child windows to another service or window may cause items to display improperly.
trans-unit.target: Explicitamente domínio pai essas janelas filho de outro serviço ou janela pode fazer com que itens a serem exibidos incorretamente.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a collection of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar uma coleção de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem> objetos.

trans-unit.source: For a full example of implementing smart tags, see [How to: Attach Smart Tags to a Windows Forms Component](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233).
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo completo de implementação de marcas inteligentes, consulte [como: Anexar marcas inteligentes para um componente de Windows Forms](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233).

trans-unit.source: The panel text for this item.
trans-unit.target: O texto do painel para este item.

trans-unit.source: The case-sensitive <see cref="T:System.String" /> that defines the groupings of panel entries.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.String" /> que diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas que define os agrupamentos de entradas de painel.

trans-unit.source: Supplemental text for this item, potentially used in ToolTips or the status bar.
trans-unit.target: Texto suplementar para este item, potencialmente usados em dicas de ferramenta ou a barra de status.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem" />.

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem> is an abstract class, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.%23ctor%2A> constructor is intended to be called from derived classes only.
trans-unit.target: Porque <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem> é uma classe abstrata, o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.%23ctor%2A> construtor destina-se a ser chamado de apenas as classes derivadas.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how the `category` parameter is used to group items on a panel, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como o `category` parâmetro é usado para agrupar itens em um painel, consulte o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to allow this item to be placed into a group of items that have the same <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.Category" /> property value.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se você deseja permitir que este item seja colocado em um grupo de itens que têm o mesmo valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.Category" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the item can be grouped; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o item pode ser agrupado; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Because multiple <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> objects may be combined to form a single smart tag panel, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.AllowAssociate%2A> property indicates whether the current item can be rearranged by category.
trans-unit.target: Como vários <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> objetos podem ser combinados para formar um painel de marcas inteligentes único, o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.AllowAssociate%2A> propriedade indica se o item atual pode ser reorganizado por categoria.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.AllowAssociate%2A> property is used in conjunction with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem.RelatedComponent%2A> property on the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionPropertyItem> types.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.AllowAssociate%2A> propriedade é usada em conjunto com o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem.RelatedComponent%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionPropertyItem> tipos.

trans-unit.source: For example, ASP.NET uses a data-bound control like <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> to connect to a data source control like <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o ASP.NET usa um controle associado a dados como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> para se conectar a um controle de fonte de dados como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>.

trans-unit.source: Both have a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> with its own set of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: Ambos têm um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> com seu próprio conjunto de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has items like <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>, `Edit Fields`, and `AutoFormat`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> controle tem itens, como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>, `Edit Fields`, e `AutoFormat`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> class has `Configure` and `Refresh Items`, which have <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.AllowAssociate%2A> set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> classe tem `Configure` e `Refresh Items`, que tem <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.AllowAssociate%2A> definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> item has a related component, which is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> do controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> item possui um componente relacionado, que é o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> objeto.

trans-unit.source: All the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> object's items that have <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.AllowAssociate%2A> set to `true` are automatically included in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control's action list.
trans-unit.target: Todos os a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> itens do objeto que tem <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.AllowAssociate%2A> definida como `true` são incluídos automaticamente no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> lista de ação do controle da.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows how the two lists are merged in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control's designer action list.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra como as duas listas são mescladas no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> lista de ação de designer do controle da.

trans-unit.source: GridView items
trans-unit.target: Itens de GridView

trans-unit.source: SqlDataSource items
trans-unit.target: Itens de SqlDataSource

trans-unit.source: - `DataSourceID` (related component = `SqlDataSource`)
trans-unit.target: - `DataSourceID` (componente relacionado = `SqlDataSource`)

trans-unit.source: - Edit Fields
trans-unit.target: -Editar campos

trans-unit.source: - AutoFormat
trans-unit.target: -AutoFormatação

trans-unit.source: - Configure (`AllowAssociate` = `true`)
trans-unit.target: -Configurar (`AllowAssociate` = `true`)

trans-unit.source: - Refresh (`AllowAssociate` = `true`)
trans-unit.target: -Atualizar (`AllowAssociate` = `true`)

trans-unit.source: Merged GridView control's smart tasks panel
trans-unit.target: Painel de tarefas inteligentes do controle GridView mesclada

trans-unit.source: - DataSourceID
trans-unit.target: - DataSourceID

trans-unit.source: - Configure
trans-unit.target: -Configurar

trans-unit.source: - Refresh
trans-unit.target: -Atualização

trans-unit.source: - Edit Fields
trans-unit.target: -Editar campos

trans-unit.source: - AutoFormat
trans-unit.target: -AutoFormatação

trans-unit.source: Gets the group name for an item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do grupo para um item.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the group that the item is a member of.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o que o item é um membro do grupo.

trans-unit.source: Item categories are defined by their names, which are case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: Categorias de item são definidas por seus nomes, que diferenciam maiusculas de minúsculas.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how items are grouped by category, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como os itens são agrupados por categoria, consulte o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList.GetSortedActionItems%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Gets the supplemental text for the item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o texto suplementar para o item.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the descriptive text for the item.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que contém o texto descritivo para o item.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.Description%2A> property is used whenever a plain text description of the item is required (for example, in ToolTips and the status bar).
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.Description%2A> propriedade é usada sempre que uma descrição de texto sem formatação do item é necessário (por exemplo, em dicas de ferramenta e a barra de status).

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is set in the constructor for this class.
trans-unit.target: O valor dessa propriedade é definido no construtor para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the text for this item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o texto para esse item.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the display text for the item.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que contém o texto exibido para o item.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.DisplayName%2A> property is set in the constructor for this class.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.DisplayName%2A> propriedade é definida no construtor para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection that can be used to store programmer-defined key/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma referência a uma coleção que pode ser usada para armazenar pares chave-valor definidos pelo programador.

trans-unit.source: A collection that implements <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção que implementa <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.Properties%2A> property allows the programmer to store arbitrary data within an item.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.Properties%2A> propriedade permite que o programador armazenar dados arbitrários dentro de um item.

trans-unit.source: The standard properties for this class, such as <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.Category%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.DisplayName%2A>, are not stored in this collection.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades padrão para essa classe, como <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.Category%2A> e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem.DisplayName%2A>, não são armazenados na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The type of this property is actually <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: O tipo dessa propriedade é realmente <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this item appears in source code view.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se esse item aparece na exibição de código-fonte.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this item appears in source code view; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se este item aparece no modo de exibição de código fonte; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="true" />.
